alert.note: Alert for Upper Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:55PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Hunterdon, southwestern Warren and north central Bucks Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 655 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Milford, or 11 miles southeast of Easton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tinicum, High Bridge, Clinton, Alpha, Glen Gardner, Ferndale, Frenchtown, Milford, Bloomsbury, Riegelsville, Revere, Ottsville, Erwinna and Phillipsburg. This includes Interstate 78 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northwestern New Jersey...and eastern and southeastern Pennsylvania.
